entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
